storyInfo: An investigator confirms what happened at Site 359 with Dorothyâ€”while she accompanies her friends back to their homes in her dreams, and also tries to find which way to go herself.

attributes.content: Name?
Dorothy.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Please provide your full name.
I suggest you cooperate. This conversation will be recorded in its entirety.
Our next course of action hinges on the results of our investigation, in conjunction with the findings of our interrogation.
This will affect the fates of both you and those involved with Site 359.
Alright, I understand.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: My full name is Dorothy Franks.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Dorothy! Dorothy! Come take a look, hurry!
attributes.name: Basket-holding Girl

attributes.content: There's a giant meadow just up ahead!
attributes.name: Basket-holding Girl

attributes.content: You can see everything from there, so let's try to find your home! Um...a silver house...
attributes.name: Basket-holding Girl

attributes.content: GO... GO-LOS-SEE!
attributes.name: Golosse

attributes.content: Hey, Golosse! Move your balloon outta the way a little!
attributes.name: Basket-holding Girl

attributes.content: You're blocking the view!
attributes.name: Basket-holding Girl

attributes.content: I already took a good look, Veggie.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: No silver house here... I guess my home is someplace else.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Oh...that's fine, my home isn't here either.
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: It's beautiful out here, but still not as nice as the wheat field back home!
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: Hm? Golosse... what's wrong? Trying to get me to look at something?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Ah... I think there's someone over there.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Good day to you all.
G-Good day, Mr. Vulpo! You look like you're in some sort of trouble?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I can't find my home.
attributes.name: Curbside Vulpo

attributes.content: I was arguing with my brother, and it got so bad we almost brought the house down. I ran away and vowed never to return.
attributes.name: Curbside Vulpo

attributes.content: So I ended up here... It's so scary outside and I want to go home, but I can't.
attributes.name: Curbside Vulpo

attributes.content: Why not? Are you lost?
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: If you can't find your way home, you can join us to look for it.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Alright, I'll tag along with you kind ladies and this... balloon-carrying robot.
attributes.name: Curbside Vulpo

attributes.content: But I'm telling you, when you see my home, you'll understand why I said I could never go back.
attributes.name: Curbside Vulpo

attributes.content: By the way, I'm not a Vulpo. I'm a proud Aslan.
attributes.name: Curbside Vulpo

attributes.content: So, your goal was to find your 'home?'
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: And at the same time, help those Pioneers find their own 'homes?'
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Exactly.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I came to Site 359 to find out what happened here.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: So I'll ask you politely not to stall my investigation with vague wording.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: I'm not trying to do anything like that. I really was looking for home.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: If you don't mind, could I confirm one more timeâ€”
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: All other the personnel from Site 359, as well as the Pioneers, they've all been relocated?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I'm under no obligation to answer your questions.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Why is it you're so concerned with those Pioneers?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Your mother was a Pioneer as well, is that correct?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You spent your childhood with her and her fellow Pioneers, is that correct?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: And your mother died in a Catastrophe out in the wilderness, is that correct?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: I rather not talk about that, sir.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I'm sure you know my background well enough... But what does that have to do with your investigation?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Right. I apologize if my phrasing has upset you.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: My working theory goes like this: Those people must have been very important to you.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: The Pioneers... they wander the wilderness until they can go no further.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: They migrate from one end to another, like a storm with nowhere to go. They may be called Pioneers, but they have no land to call their own.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I wanted to give them a better life.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: As for my loved ones... I will carry on for them, to return to their 'homes,' the ones they've visited so many times in their dreams.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: GO-LOS-SEE.
attributes.name: Golosse

attributes.content: Here?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Golosse... This is your home?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: GO.
attributes.name: Golosse

attributes.content: Seems like its trying to tell us something... look at its hands.
attributes.name: Mr. 'Aslan'

attributes.content: Do you think it's asking us to open that drawer for it?
attributes.name: Mr. 'Aslan'

attributes.content: Drawer? What could be inside...? Let me see!
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: It's... a recorder?
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: Home... home...
attributes.name: Golosse

attributes.content: Hey! Did... did Golosse just say a word?!
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: The robot begins to disassemble itself.
The balloon that it has been holding floats to the ceiling.
The robot opens its chest to reveal its 'core,' and places its 'heart' into the recorder.
The recorder gives off a voice... an elderly voice.
*Cough*... I am Golosse, a robot craftsman.
attributes.name: Old Voice

attributes.content: I can't walk anymore, and I'm still a long way from home.
attributes.name: Old Voice

attributes.content: I recorded my voice and implanted it into this body. I hope this robot can bring it back home for me.
attributes.name: Old Voice

attributes.content: Dear stranger...
attributes.name: Old Voice

attributes.content: If anyone hears this... please go and see for me, find out what's become of my home...
attributes.name: Old Voice

attributes.content: Go on, robot, carry my voice back home!
attributes.name: Old Voice

attributes.content: The elderly voice stops.
LOSE...
attributes.name: Golosse

attributes.content: The robot makes one final sound before reverting to a heap of cold steel.
Golosse... I know that's not your name, but I still think I should call you that... you did it.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: But what you've accomplished, is more than just acting as a proxy to carry your master's voice to a long lost home.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: This place... is your home too.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Mr. Lupo.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: What is it? And I'm not a Lupo, I'm an Aslan.
attributes.name: Mr. 'Aslan'

attributes.content: Alright, Mr. Aslan... could you help me fetch Golosse's balloon?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I want to bring its balloon with us, and carry on.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Let's get back on track. In regards to your cooperation with the military, I see Ferdinand was your liaison, and your experiments appear to have been fully compliant with the law, so far.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Let me clarify your personal relationship, which appears to have been very close? Were you really unaware of what he was planning?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: I'm sorry, but I never knew him that well.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Fair enough. We have no evidence that you knew what he was up to.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Records show a pattern of accessing internal Rhine Lab documents typical for a researcher.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: I'm always pressed for time. I just wish my experiments could be faster and better... I don't have the luxury of exploring unrelated materials.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You say that, but what you've accomplished is still pretty incredible.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: No ordinary person would avoid obtaining information like that, let alone a Rhine Lab Director.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: We have reason to suspect you prepared these records to clear yourself of suspicion.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Preparing false records for a post-event investigation wouldn't help me complete my experiments faster, nor would it help the Pioneers.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: So why would I do that?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Wouldn't you be curious about your role in his plans? Wouldn't you want to know if he saw you as a partner or a pawn?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: No, that really wouldn't make a difference to me at all.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: My research, my vision... that's what matters to me. And it could be extraordinarily valuable to someone else.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: If that someone else wants to make use of my research and vision, I'm willing to make a trade.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: So you're saying you don't mind being a pawn. You're not afraid of being used, of suffering damages?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: By suffering damages... do you mean getting put behind bars?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: That could very well happen...
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Yes, I'm aware. It happened to Loken Williams... I've seen my share of scientists who've made enough mistakes for the government to abandon them.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: However, I do know there are quite a few people who get themselves thrown in prison just to look for Loken, to ask for his advice and assistance on their research, as I once did.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Ahem. That is to say, you've made your own terrible decisions.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: That road I've walked... is how I managed to get a leg up on the competition. It's essentially how Columbia functions.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: How else could the daughter of a Pioneer become a Director of Rhine Lab?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Who would've thought... you've even thought through these things? But... you may not care if you're being used, sure. How about the Pioneers?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Ferdinand and the others may see you as an equal, but when it comes to the Pioneers, they might as well be plastic bags littered out in the wilderness after they're no longer useful, huh?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Well... they will eventually pay their dues.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Even if I can't see things through now, I will eventually. It's my responsibility, after my mistakes.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: That was... the biggest mistake I've ever made.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Mr. Feline!
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Mr. Feline? What are you standing there for? We need to go!
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I'm not a Vulpo or a Feline. I'm an Aslan.
attributes.name: Mr. 'Aslan'

attributes.content: Miss, this is the last time I'll correct you. If it happens again, you'll see the back of my sharp molars instead.
attributes.name: Mr. 'Aslan'

attributes.content: Alright, Mr. Aslan. Come along with us now.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You go on ahead, I've already found my home.
attributes.name: Mr. 'Aslan'

attributes.content: Your home? Where is it...?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Look up.
attributes.name: Mr. 'Aslan'

attributes.content: An upside-down house hangs above Dorothy's head, floating in the vast sky.
Dorothy finally realizes why Mr. 'Aslan' said he could never return home.
I made an irreversible mistake, with only my own pride to blame, and now I have left my home for good.
attributes.name: Mr. 'Aslan'

attributes.content: Mr. 'Aslan,' there must be a way to get you back. We just have to put our heads together!
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You go ahead, I'll stay here. This is the punishment I deserve.
attributes.name: Mr. 'Aslan'
Dorothy
attributes.content: Floating... in the sky...

attributes.name: Dorothy
attributes.content: I've got it!

attributes.name: Dorothy
attributes.content: Mr. 'Aslan!' We still have Golosse's balloon!
Balloon...? You're going to float me up with that?
attributes.name: Mr. 'Aslan'

attributes.content: I'll try... I think it's working, my feet are off the ground! I just need to lose some more weight!
attributes.name: Mr. 'Aslan'

attributes.content: Oh my! Mr. 'Aslan,' what are you doing...? Is this... water?
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: There's so much... Why is it coming out of your ears?
attributes.name: Veggie
Mr. 'Aslan'
attributes.content: Heheh... I gulped down all that water just to make myself look stronger.

attributes.name: Mr. 'Aslan'
attributes.content: It's like my brain has been bobbing up and down in my head this whole time... Look at me! I'm flying!
The 'Aslan' rises slowly up into the air with the balloonâ€”he is screaming, but it is unclear if from panic or excitement.
For just a moment, Dorothy gets a look at his back molarsâ€”they aren't sharp at all. In fact, they're round and cute.
For some unknown reason, Dorothy sheds a tear.
What do you know about Kristen Wright's plans?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Nothing at all.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You may not believe it, but it's the truth.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I'm sorry to say, I'm probably the most out-of-touch person in all of Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Do you know where she might be right now?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: I'm very sorry, but I really don't.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: All I know is that she's an idealist. And a very ambitious one.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: When she invited me to join Rhine, I saw the same kind of idealistic 'lightning bolt' that I have in her.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Lightning bolt?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: An unusual figure appears in the skies above Trimounts.
A pillar of light pierces the sky, and at the moment the truth behind the azure blue pours out for only a moment.
What... is that...?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: What's happening in the sky over Trimounts?!
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Is... is that Kristen's 'ambitious target?!'
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Director Franks.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Director? Are... are you crying?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: So that's the truth behind the sky... It's beautiful.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I just can't hold back my tears.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I expected nothing less from Kristen... She really did it.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Director, you just said you didn't know what Kristen's plans were?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: This definitely looks like something she would do.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: And... I'm feeling something genuine.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: It's my 'Transmitter.'
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I can feel it through the 'Transmitter'... They've gone to the other side of the skyâ€”
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: The river of stars does not hide from its impulse to rush into my mind...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: 'Transmitter', huh?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: That sounds like the product of the experiments at Site 359.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: I am curious... since you're so closely linked with this creation, did exposure to it result in any negative effects?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Like a side effect?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You could put it that way.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: I haven't experienced any particularly noticeable symptoms so far.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: If you really press me on it, I do seem to dream a lot more.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Sometimes I can't tell if I'm awake or asleep... or I suddenly feel...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Feel what?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Director Franks. Director Franks?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Oh... Sorry about that, the feeling just came by again.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Like I'm in a hot, arid, deserted wasteland.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Hot...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: So hot...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Veggie... slow down a little...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Dorothy, I've reached my stop. This place here's my home.
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: Huh? Here...? But it's so hot... too hot for anything to ever grow.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Where's the wheat field you talked about? The beautiful new brick house... and your friend who's been waiting for you in the fields?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Uh... my friend, isn't he right next to us?
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: Here? Oh...are you talking about this raggedy scarecrow?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Yeah, hehe, it's been so long. I didn't expect him to change this much...
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: And my home too... it's much bigger.
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: Veggie...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Why don't you come with me? You can live with me!
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Dorothy, you've come such a long way with us.
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: Golosse, Mr. 'Aslan,' and me... we all appreciate you keeping us company on our journey.
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: But now is the time to say goodbye.
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: B-But, I'm just worried...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: It's alright, Dorothy. I've decided to stay here.
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: Even if it has changed a lot... this place is still my home. My friend... he's been here the whole time.
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: I'll stay with him and rebuild our home together.
attributes.name: Veggie

attributes.content: A breeze blows, and the scarecrow sways with the wind.
Dorothy bids farewell to her last remaining friend.
The desert spans far and wide, but where lies the silver house from her memories?
Kristen has lost her goddamned mind...
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Just what kind of monsters has she gathered in Rhine Lab...?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Kristen... is this what she wanted to find? The answer to the question of 'home?'
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I'm going to have to congratulate Control, the next time I see her.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: And Parvis... It looks like he's modified my creation. Hmm, now that's interesting.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: But 'Transmitter' is just a 'Transmitter', so if it's not used to sustain life, then what does it do?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Wait... I suddenly thought of a possibility.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Life can't survive outside starpods, but that might not be the case for a 'Transmitter.' So maybeâ€”they could take the place of humans in harsher environments, be it in the center of a Catastrophe, or...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: This is wonderful, Sir, please give me a little time. I need to imprint this scene in my head, and note down everything I'm thinking right now.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: There is still so much more room for improvement in my experiments with endless possibilities for what the Transmitters could become, the equality I want, the future I want, the... home I long for...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: What exactly is this 'home' you keep bringing up? You don't mean it's... in the sky?
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Home?
What I call home... my futurescape...
What does it look like?
This...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: This is...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Is this my house? This silver house...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Dorothy, over here...
attributes.name: Motherly Voice

attributes.content: That's Mama's voice...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Mama... where are you? I can't find you...?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Dorothy, over here...
attributes.name: Motherly Voice

attributes.text: Dorothy, this shouldn't be your futurescape...

attributes.content: Futurescape...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Then where should it be?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Director Franks, I'd like you to stop talking to yourself.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: And answer my question.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Alright. I was just recalling my inspiration there.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: The 'home' I'm talking about is not the one you're thinking of.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: What I seek is a more egalitarian, idealistic society, and it might just be right under our feet. Or it could be much farther away, as far away as Kristen is looking.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Now that I'm thinking about it again, Kristen, Parvis, Ferdinand, and me, we Rhine Lab scientists all have our separate goals.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: If I'm looking for what we have it common... I might say... the brilliant 'lightning bolt' I see blazing in all of us.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Dorothy notices the investigator hitting the pause button on the recorder.
Director Franks, I think I need to remind you of something.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: Suppose you pursue your ideals in a manner similar to that of Kristen, Ferdinand, or any of the othersâ€”
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: What you just said might have unfortunate consequences for you.
attributes.name: Investigator

attributes.content: A wind blows from an unknown direction.
...The scent of the wilderness.
Otti.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: How... do you know my name?
attributes.name: Otti

attributes.content: Why not hear my story first?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I once helped a Pioneer by the name of Linda.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: She was forcibly separated from her family at a young age and abandoned in the wilderness due to her Oripathy.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: The time she spent with her family in the countryside was her most precious memory.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: When autumn came, that field of golden wheat... with the scarecrow swaying amidst the crops...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: And the brother who always tagged along behind her, running endlessly through the wheat fields...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You... know my sister?
attributes.name: Otti

attributes.content: How... is she now...? How has her life been?
attributes.name: Otti

attributes.content: So it really is you. Linda showed me a photo of her family... The first time I saw you, I guessed that you were her brother.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: She got married, and even invited me to her wedding. It was a simple event, out in the wastes, but she married a decent man.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: They even have a child now. He's adorable, pestering his mother every day to hear the story of the scarecrow.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: She always said that her brother was her pride and joy... She was sure that the remarkable and responsible Otti would take care of the family for her.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I'm sorry... I don't even know what to say.
attributes.name: Otti

attributes.content: Should I be thanking you, Director Franks?
attributes.name: Otti

attributes.content: There's no need for that, Otti. I'm telling you this story not because I want something in return.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I feel... duty-bound to help the Pioneers. I expect to keep pursuing my ideals, in the same way I have.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: So, my conscience can be clear.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Please put everything I've said on the record.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: The only thing that should not be traded is the love and goodwill of man.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I understand, Director Franks.
attributes.name: Otti

attributes.content: He switches the recorder on.
The next day...
You're here.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You knew I would be?
attributes.name: Mysterious Visitor

attributes.content: You are an excellent partner.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I knew you would come find me, if you wanted even more responsibility.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Looking closer, I think you've grown again.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: The 'transmitter' was indeed utilized as you expected.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I should thank you for the tip.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I've agreed to cooperate with the government, so I came here to retrieve the 'transmitter.'
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Why don't we make a 'trade', my good doctor?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: What do you want?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Where is Kristen right now? And where is Rhine Lab headed?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I don't know.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: At least, that was the only answer I had for a long time, for anything about Rhine Lab personnel, or any of the others.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What are you planning, to be asking such questions?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I want to remain at Rhine Lab, and continue my research.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Of course, it would be nice to travel around to meet other like-minded individuals, so my research could benefit even more people.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I think I remember, you're working with a company called Rhodes Island these days?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Do you think maybe... Rhodes Island would be willing to collaborate with me?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Everyone deserves the truth of scienceâ€”I know, Olivia, this is our common dream.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: With you helping to keep the results of my work in the right handsâ€”
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I believe that our dream will eventually be realized.
attributes.name: Dorothy
